com.interpss.core.algo.dclf

Interface ISensitivity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm, NetGenAdjustAlgorithm, SenAnalysisAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithmImpl, NetGenAdjustAlgorithmImpl, SenAnalysisAlgorithmImpl

    public interface ISensitivity
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'ISensitivity'. Interface of sensitivity calculation methods at the lowest level, one injection bus with regarding to the swing or ref bus.
    See Also:
    DclfAlgorithmPackage.getISensitivity()

    • Method Detail

      • calBusSensitivity

        double calBusSensitivity(SenAnalysisType type,
                         java.lang.String injectBusId,
                         java.lang.String busId)
        get bus sensitivity from the cached results. If no existing, calculate the sensitivity. Sensitivity is defined as dAngle(busId)/dP(injectBus).
        Parameters:
        type - sensitivity type
        injectBusId - injection bus id
        busId - bus id of the bus to calculate the sensitivity

      • calBusSensitivity

        double calBusSensitivity(SenAnalysisType type,
                         java.lang.String injectBusId,
                         int busSortNumber)
        get bus sensitivity from the cached results
        Parameters:
        type - sensitivity type
        injectBusId - injection bus id
        busSortNumber - bus number of the bus to calculate the sensitivity
